# Delete a custom field from a custom object definition

Learn how to delete an existing custom field from a custom object definition.

1.  Navigate to in the left navigation.
2.  Click the name of the custom object definition that contains the custom field you want to delete. The custom object detail page opens.
3.  Locate the custom field you want to delete, and then click the Delete icon ![Delete icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/27058e0f-c08d-4fed-a45b-366f7f3de8f3?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..bdTZFDk6JrYv_Ncg438ywozPtFy9ou7IUFIzteYMIHU).
4.  Click Delete on the confirmation dialog.
